Name: Spider Solitaire Collection
About the game: 20 popular Spider games in one. Do you love Spider Solitaire (also known as 'Spider' or 'Spider Patience'), but want a bigger challenge? Now you can play Spider Solitaire and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty. The collection contains: • Beeswax • Black Widow • Curds and Whey • Mrs. Mop • Scorpion • Simple Simon • Spider • Spiderette • Tarantula • Wasp Plus 10 more... Features: • Unlimited undo • Auto complete • Statistics • Rules for each game
